document.full_text: the yankees' four-game winning streak ended at angel stadium despite an encouraging performance by ivan nova, who overcame a few shaky innings to work into the seventh.
document.title: angels 3, yankees 2: despite nova's solid performance, yankees stumble against angels
lines_and_colors: the yankees' four-game winning streak ended at angel stadium despite an encouraging performance by ivan nova, who overcame a few shaky innings to work into the seventh.
